questions.question: What civilization did humanist thinkers begin to study the ideas of during the Renaissance?
What group in society first started studying and believing in humanist ideas?
Which of these is NOT a value of humanist thought?
Which of these quotes best shows humanist ideas?

choices.answer: Let God have your life- he can do more with it than you can.
Cultivation of the mind is as necessary as food to the body.
Difficult roads lead to beautiful destinations.
Mountain Dew is the best soft drink ever made.

questions.question: How did humanist ideas change the Christian worldview?

choices.answer: Humanists became atheists, and stopped believing in God
Humanists still believed in God, just not as much as before
Thought that to develop one's talents/mind, was serving God
Humanists believed all things were pre-determined by God

questions.question: The Medici donated a library to Florence, for all to read. How does this show Civic humanism?

choices.answer: It shows the Medici's wealth and power over the people
Shows the Medici believed in improving society & education
It shows the Medici wanted to please God with their charity

questions.question: What was the typical theme of Renaissance sonnets?

choices.answer: The human experience (life, death, emotions, etc.)

questions.question: My name is Luigi! My hobbies are writing poems, studying, and volunteering. Am I a humanist?
What is a way that humanist ideas were evident in Renaissance art?

choices.answer: Human bodies made to look real, beautiful, individual, etc.
References to Greek & Roman myths, ideas, philosophers, etc.
Vanishing points & shadows add depth and realism.
Beauty of the natural world was shown (nature, animals, etc)

questions.question: Is this a humanist, Renaissance painting?
Is this Renaissance art, reflecting humanist ideas? (the sculpture shows Mary & Jesus)
